structure.unit: SCHOOL EMPLOYEES -- TEACHERS' RETIREMENT AND TENURE

law.catch_line: Certification of teachers for gifted education.
law.text: All persons employed as teachers for gifted education shall hold an appropriate certificate endorsement for gifted education, except that all teachers having certificates initially issued for a duration period on or before July 1, 1984, or proper renewals thereof, shall remain eligible thereafter for assignment as teachers for gifted education, for the grade levels of the base certificate, provided any such assignment was valid under the original certificate at the time it was issued.
law.history: Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 589, sec. 4, effective July 15, 1998.
